title: Bride and Prejudice's Codie Lea BREAKS DOWN in tears
text:
They're the Gold Coast-based couple who have become inseparable since meeting at the races in 2015.

And on Monday night's episode of Bride and Prejudice: The Forbidden Weddings, Codie Lea shed tears over Nathan's obsession with money.

The hair stylist told her fiancé that he's missing out on quality moments with their daughter Starr-Armani, two, due to his job as a mining industry FIFO worker.

'You love money so much!' Bride and Prejudice's Codie Lea (pictured), 21, BROKE DOWN in tears during Monday's episode, as she and Nathan came to a head over their differing values

During Monday's episode, the show's therapist Leanne Hall invited the couples to take part in a workshop that dealt with conflict in relationships.

Each couple chose a ball with a topic labelled across it, such as money, sex, housework and communication.

They discussed how the issue was causing conflict in their own relationship.

Codie Lea shed tears as she confronted Nathan, 25, on spending so much time away from home.

In session: Therapist Leanne Hall (centre) invited the couples to take part in a workshop that dealt with conflict in relationships. Codie Lea and Nathan (right), 25, chose to discuss money

Common issues in relationships: Each couple chose a ball with a topic labelled across it, such as money, sex, housework and communication

'Because you do love money so much, you've lost really big parts like Starr's first time walking, her first words, you've missed out on a lot of family time,' she said.

Nathan understood where Codie Lea was coming from, but said he will never change his views on work and money as he grew up with nothing.

'I never forget what I miss, but this is forever going to be a big thing for me because I grew up with bugger all and I want to give you girls everything,' he said.

Demanding job: Nathan said that while he understands he's missing out on family time, he will never change his views on work and money as he grew up with nothing

Determined to make it work: Despite their conflicting opinions, the couple said they will work through their issues, with Codie Lea insisting that it's 'only a temporary situation'

Despite their conflicting opinions, the couple said they will work through their issues, with Codie Lea revealing that it's 'only a temporary situation'.

In previous episodes, Codie Lea has had to deal with the 'mother-in-law from hell' Laurelle, who called her a 'plastic c**t' during a tense confrontation.

And in another shocking scene, Laurelle threatened to take her son Nathan to court for visitation rights to see her granddaughter Starr-Armani.
description: Bride and Prejudice couple Codie Lea and Nathan discussed Nathan's love of money, during Monday night's episode.
authors: Kristy Johnson For Daily Mail Australia
